document.title: SP525 Your Microwave Oven - A Real Time Saver

author.organization: The University of Tennessee Agricultural Extension Service

document.abstract: A microwave oven can be a real time saver by reducing the amount of time it takes to prepare a meal. The microwave oven cooks food faster than a conventional oven by using short, high-frequency energy waves similar to TV, radar and radio waves. These waves are created by a magnetron, a part of your microwave oven. These waves cause molecules inside the food to move rapidly and create heat. It is this heat that cooks the food.
